description: This is the main entry point for a Flutter application, defining the basic widget structure including MyApp and MyHomePage classes, which set up the MaterialApp and a simple loading screen.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the Flutter application that sets up the MaterialApp theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the home page with a title and loading indicator.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class for MyHomePage that builds the Scaffold containing AppBar and body content.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the Flutter app, invokes runApp with MyApp.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for MyApp that returns the MaterialApp widget.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for MyHomePage widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for _MyHomePageState, constructing the Scaffold with AppBar and loading content.
